article_title: Hands of a Surgeon: Ben Carson Takes On ‘Operation’
article_text:
Sen. Lindsey Graham made a video recently of himself burning, dropping, slicing and crushing cellphones to make a joke at the expense of Republican presidential rival Donald Trump, who had read Mr. Graham’s cellphone number to the crowd at a campaign event.

Now another candidate, Ben Carson, has gotten in the video act, with the retired pediatric surgeon playing a game of Operation, skillfully removing plastic body parts while also making a slight dig at the Obama health law. Both the Graham and Carson videos were produced by the website Independent Journal Review.

Earlier, former H-P Chief Executive Carly Fiorina, the one woman among the major GOP candidates, made a video about the treatment of women in the workplace for BuzzFeed.

Here is the Carson video:
